title: User Information Input/Output
description: Write a program that takes a user's name, age, and location as input and then prints out a greeting message with the provided information. The greeting message should include the user's name, age, and location in the following format: 'Hello, my name is {name}, I am {age} years old, and I am from {location}.',
sample_output: Hello, my name is John Doe, I am 25 years old, and I am from New York.
